description: Variation of Condition 23 (Opening Hours) of Planning Permission ref:: 03/10379/FUL (as amended by 10/10228/FUL) (Demolition of existing buildings. Erection of two Class B8 (Storage and Distribution) buildings, the front one to be used as a Big Yellow Self Storage Building, provision of parking and servicing) dated: 07/06/2004. Amendment to consist of changes to opening hours on Sundays (8am-8pm)
